Field Detail

iAlignment

IntMathVec[] iAlignment
Array of 0-1 vectors, encoding the alignment as columns

iSequences

int[][] iSequences
Array of arrays, encoding the sequences (in rows). No gaps. Range [0,iNumNucs).

iParent

private int[] iParent
Array encoding the tree. iParent[iChild] is the parent of iChild, except -1 = root's parent. Parent must be > child, and leaf indices must correspond to indices into alignment vectors

iTau

private double[] iTau
Length of incoming branches to each tree node. Root is assumed to be infinity

iLambda

double iLambda
Parameters of the TKF91 model

iMu

double iMu

iNumNucs

int iNumNucs
Number of nucleotides

iTrans

double[][][] iTrans
Transition probability matrices, iTrans[node][from][to], for each tree node except root

iEquil

double[] iEquil
Equilibrium probabilities for nucleotides.

iH

private double[] iH
Intermediate results for TKF91 model, initialised in recursion(), used in treeRecursion()

iN

Intermediate results for TKF91 model, initialised in recursion(), used in treeRecursion()

Intermediate results for TKF91 model, initialised in recursion(), used in treeRecursion()

Populates the iParent and iTau arrays.

Returns:
the node number of the given node.

initTKF91

public void initTKF91()
Populates the iB, iE, iH and iN arrays, and iInitial value

treeRecursion

private double treeRecursion(IntMathVec iSignature,
                             IntMathVec iPos)
Calculates 'conditional factor' associated to emission encoded by iSignature, at position iPos. Nulls in iSignature represent no-emissions, others indicate homology family (1,2,...,cMaxUnalignDimension, inclusive)

recursion

public double recursion()
Returns:
the logLikelihood of the alignment given tree, substitution model, et cetera
